name: Hyperliquid (L1) / Hyperliquid EVM
notes: If you mean Hyperliquid EVM, chain-registry-like data is on chainid.network; Hyperliquid EVM Testnet uses EVM chainId 998 in chainid.network/chains.json.

name: Kava
notes: RPC/REST/GRPC endpoints + logo URIs are in chain-registry chain.json & assetlist.json (see fetchFromChainRegistry).
